name: Amarnath Reddy Mukkamalla
position: Data Scientist at App Orchid | IIT KGP '22
about: I’m an IIT Kharagpur graduate and avid Machine Learning enthusiast. Currently a Data Scientist at App Orchid, where we are focused on operationalising AI across enterprises with unparalleled speed. Eager to connect, collaborate, and contribute to the dynamic world of AI. Let’s innovate together!

current_company.name: App Orchid Inc
current_company.title: Data Scientist at App Orchid | IIT KGP '22

experience.title: Data Science Engineer
experience.description: I am a data science engineer with experience in developing and deploying AI/ML solutions for large-scale, real-world applications. Throughout my career, I have worked on integrating machine learning models, automation, and MLOps frameworks to optimize workflows, automate processes, and drive insights in semiconductor manufacturing. I am highly skilled in leveraging cloud platforms like Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) for scalable deployments and Apache Airflow for pipeline automation.- Spearheaded the development of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system, enhancing chatbot functionality using natural language processing and language models.- Deployed cutting-edge machine learning models for wafer defect classification and yield management, improving decision-making accuracy and enhancing quality analysis.- Implemented CI/CD pipelines and scalable cloud-based solutions to support continuous improvement and rapid model deployment.- Automated key manufacturing processes, including Defects per Million (DPM) monitoring and root cause analysis, improving efficiency and streamlining workflows.
experience.description_html: I am a data science engineer with experience in developing and deploying AI/ML solutions for large-scale, real-world applications. Throughout my career, I have worked on integrating machine learning models, automation, and MLOps frameworks to optimize workflows, automate processes, and drive insights in semiconductor manufacturing. I am highly skilled in leveraging cloud platforms like Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) for scalable deployments and Apache Airflow for pipeline automation.- Spearheaded the development of a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system, enhancing chatbot functionality using natural language processing and language models.- Deployed cutting-edge machine learning models for wafer defect classification and yield management, improving decision-making accuracy and enhancing quality analysis.- Implemented CI/CD pipelines and scalable cloud-based solutions to support continuous improvement and rapid model deployment.- Automated key manufacturing processes, including Defects per Million (DPM) monitoring and root cause analysis, improving efficiency and streamlining workflows.

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: • Worked on an Automation Tool which converts the source code from Oracle PL/SQL to Snowflake SQL using ANTLR with Python     • Increased the ANTLR parse-tree-walker performance by 15% by restructuring the ANTLR grammar and simplifying ATN graphs     • Tested the converted language semantics with relevant data from database and made required changes to grammar and listener functions     • Started work on improving the tool using Neural Machine Translation (seq2seq model with a transformer architecture)
experience.description_html: • Worked on an Automation Tool which converts the source code from Oracle PL/SQL to Snowflake SQL using ANTLR with Python • Increased the ANTLR parse-tree-walker performance by 15% by restructuring the ANTLR grammar and simplifying ATN graphs • Tested the converted language semantics with relevant data from database and made required changes to grammar and listener functions • Started work on improving the tool using Neural Machine Translation (seq2seq model with a transformer architecture)

experience.title: Student Volunteer
experience.description: The National Service Scheme (NSS) is a Central Sector Scheme of Government of India, Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. It provides the opportunity to the student youth of Technical Institution, Graduate & Post Graduate at colleges and University level of India to take part in various government-led community service activities & programmes.The sole aim of the NSS is to provide hands-on experience to young students in delivering community service.
experience.description_html: The National Service Scheme (NSS) is a Central Sector Scheme of Government of India, Ministry of Youth Affairs & Sports. It provides the opportunity to the student youth of Technical Institution, Graduate & Post Graduate at colleges and University level of India to take part in various government-led community service activities & programmes.The sole aim of the NSS is to provide hands-on experience to young students in delivering community service. <!---->

experience.title: Secretary Strategy Cup
experience.description: Technology Students’ Gymkhana is the hub of the numerous extra-curricular and co-curricular activities in IIT Kharagpur ranging from sports to socio-cultural. The Gymkhana is managed by the students, for the students, under the guidance and active participation of the faculty and staff members.The moto of Technology Students'​ Gymkhana is YOGAH KARMASU KAUSALAM which in English means "Perfection in action is Yoga"​. Our goal is to bring overall development in IITians through cultivating and nurturing their extra-curricular talents
